result.longName: Shanghai United Imaging Healthcare Co., Ltd.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Shanghai United Imaging Healthcare Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, development, manufacture, and sale of imaging diagnosis and treatment equipment in China and the United States. Its diagnostics products include uEXPLORER, an emission computed tomography system; uPMR 790, a tomographic imager that combines emission computed tomography with nuclear magnetic resonance; uMI 780, a positron emission tomography and computed tomography system; uMI 550, an emission computed tomography system; and uMI 510, a positron emission and x-ray computer tomography imaging scanning product. The company also offers uMR 790, a magnetic resonance diagnostic device; uMR 780, a magnetic resonance diagnostic device; uMR 770, a magnetic resonance imaging system; uMR 588, a magnetic resonance diagnostic device; uMR 580, a magnetic resonance diagnostic device; uMR 570, a magnetic resonance diagnostic device; uMR 560, a magnetic resonance diagnostic device; uCT 780, an x-ray calculation tomography equipment; uCT 760, an x-ray calculation tomography equipment; uCT 550, a computed tomography x-ray system; uCT 530, a computed tomography x-ray system; uCT 520, a computed tomography x-ray system; and uCT 528, a computed tomography x-ray system. In addition, it provides uDR 596i, a digital medical x-ray system; uDR 592h, a digital medical x-ray system; uDR 780i, a digital medical x-ray system; uDR 370i, a mobile DR product equipped with remote visual exposure; uMammo 890i, a 3D digital breast machine product; uMammo 590i, a breast machine product; and radiotherapy equipment, such as uRT-linac 506c, a medical linear plus speed control system. Further, the company offers uCloud, a cloud solution for hospitals. Shanghai United Imaging Healthcare Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is based in Shanghai, China.

companyOfficers.name: Dr. Jusong  Xia
